dashboard_placeholder.title: ðŸ”¥ Dashboards 2.0
dashboard_placeholder.text1: We have something special for you in the Dashboards section!
dashboard_placeholder.text2: It will now be possible to maintain dual metrics, assign chiefs to positions, pass fill in to other employees, add an existing metric as a data source, and soon it will be data from Google Spreadsheets and CRM systems.
dashboard_placeholder.text3: To make this possible, and to migrate your metrics to the new version painlessly, we had to close the section until Wednesday (December 7).
dashboard_placeholder.text4: All the data that has already been filled out is intact.

warning_dialog.title: Are you sure you want to save the changes?
warning_dialog.text: When changing the interval or the start date, the existing data may shift relative to the new periods and will not be displayed

sign_in_as_another_user_description: A link to sign in as another user was copied to the clipboard. Open a new window in incognito mode, or launch a second browser and navigate to the copied link and paste it into the address bar.
company_schedule_days_overlapping: The start time of one of the working days is greater than or equal to its end time!

no_schedule_for_period: There is no schedule for the selected date range

theme_suggestion_dialog.btn_accept: Yes, let's use the dark theme

user_delete_warning.tasks_to_nearest_manager: All tasks where the employee was the author will become tasks of the nearest manager in the organizational structure
user_delete_warning.metrics_will_be_deleted: Personal metrics of the employee will be deleted

executor_deadline: The start date or deadline cannot be in the past
text_editor_bug_alert: An error has been detected that, in rare cases, results in long texts not being saved. To prevent the loss of entered text, we kindly ask you to temporarily write long texts in an external text editor and then transfer them to Tonnus, or periodically copy the text to the clipboard (Ctrl+C/Cmd+C). We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and this issue will be fixed soon.
